short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A script to open all comment links on a subreddit page (excluding stickied threads). Will not open the same link within 24 hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful for opening all the threads on a single page. It will skip the threads that it has previously opened (but not that have been opened outside of the extension). It opens them all at once so it might take a bit for the browser to finish all the web requests.

Updates: added old.reddit.com to site list, added code for new reddit layout
